item.title: Moving the data directory of Multipass and Docker
item.description: This weekend was my first adventure in Snaps. Unfortunately, this adventure quickly devolved into a murder mystery, for my hard drive. The first snap I try to compile triggers a “disk is almost out of space” notification?! Turns out building Snaps requires a surprising amount of disk space. But it wasn’t entirely Multipass’ fault, my good old friend Docker was eating up a decent chunk of my disk too.
